document_data.name: Star of Aga-Pelar
document_data.creator: [[Martek]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Star of Aga-Pelar''' was a [[star sapphire]] which the wizard [[Martek]] employed to bind the [[efreet]] Pasha [[Khalitarius]]. It was one of the five [[Star gem of Martek|Star Gems of Martek]].
document_data.Description: The [[Star of Aga-Pelar]] was a huge midnight black [[star sapphire]] with an inner asterism of pure white.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|39}}
document_data.History: After the wizard Martek used the star to bind [[Khalitharius]], he gave it to the Lord of [[Pazar]] in exchange for keeping the efreet prisoner.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|5}} By the mid-14{{th}} century DR, it was the only treasure of note still left in Pazar.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|36}}
document_data.Trivia: Of the Star Gems of Martek, only the Star of Aga-Pelar was actually a star gem: it was a star sapphire.
